abstract: Ever since the Securities and Exchange Commission charged Goldman with civil fraud over the packaging and sale of a subprime-mortgage linked security, Lloyd Blankfein and Gary Cohn have been working overtime to save the storied franchise from the worst blow to its reputation in decades.
snippet: Ever since the Securities and Exchange Commission charged Goldman with civil fraud over the packaging and sale of a subprime-mortgage linked security, Lloyd Blankfein and Gary Cohn have been working overtime to save the storied franchise from the ...
lead_paragraph: Four days after American securities regulators charged Goldman Sachs Group with civil fraud, Ash Williams, the top administrator for Florida’s $138 billion in public investments, wanted to talk to someone at the Wall Street firm, Reuters says in a special report.
